CustomField.description: Takes the pensions saving at any frequency and returns monthly value
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Pensions_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), 52*Pensions__c/12, IF( ISPICKVAL(Pensions_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Pensions__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Pensions_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Pensions__c/12,0)))
CustomField.label: Pensions savings (monthly)
